welcome.title: Welcome to Shira
welcome.subtitle: Build skills to detect and defeat phishing attempts

name.title: Add a name and email address
name.subtitle: We ask for a name and email address to make the phishing quiz feel more realistic. This information will not be saved, sent out of our servers, or shared with anyone else
name.recommendation: To be extra-safe, you can use a fake name and email address, or generate random ones.
name.name: Name
name.random_button: Make a random name and email address

apps.title: Which apps do you use?
apps.subtitle: This will help us customize the quiz questions to make them look as realistic as possible. This information will not be saved, sent out of our servers, or shared with anyone else.

fields_of_work.title: Which fields do you work in?
fields_of_work.subtitle: This will help us customize the quiz questions to make them look as realistic as possible. This information will not be saved, sent out of our servers, or shared with anyone else.

how_it_works.title: How it works
how_it_works.explanation_2: For each question, please determine whether the message shown seems like a phishing attempt or seems legitimate.
how_it_works.explanation_3: If you are not sure, you can select the “I don’t know” option.

feedback.title: Help us improve
feedback.subtitle: One last thing before the quiz results: let us know what you think about Shira to help improve it for future users.

question_1.title: 1. How easy is Shira to use?

question_2.title: 2. How likely are you to recommend Shira to friends or colleagues?

box.bottom_text: Your feedback will be sent when you click “see results”

feedback.footer_title: You’re almost done! Keep going to see your quiz results and recommended next steps.

completed.title: Quiz completed
completed.heavy_subtitle: You answered 7 out of 10 questions correctly.
completed.subtitle: Take a new quiz or check out some recommendations below to continue strengthening your skills and become better at avoiding phishing.
